parameters.name: DBInstanceName
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ForceSwitch
parameters.description: Specifies whether to forcefully perform a switchover. Set the value to 1. The value 1 specifies a forceful switchover.

parameters.name: SwitchTime
parameters.description: A reserved parameter. This parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: SwitchTimeMode
parameters.description:
The time when you want to perform the switchover.

Set the value to 0. The value 0 specifies an immediate switchover.
